title: Principles of Eco-friendly Living
headline: This free online course teaches you how to live an eco-friendly life by making your daily habits and choices more green.
description: Beyond its environmental benefits, eco-friendly living reduces maintenance costs, saves energy and improves general wellbeing. This sustainable living course explains how to minimise the environmental impact of your consumption habits. We highlight the benefits of greener food choices and discuss sustainable landscaping, carbon-neutral building materials and other green initiatives. Sign up to learn how to reduce your environmental footprint.
courseDescription:
The Earth is experiencing various environmental problems, including global climate change, air pollution, ozone depletion and the buildup of litter. People must adopt eco-friendly lifestyles in order to live sustainably. Those who make such changes are not only healthier but also help to preserve our natural environment.

This sustainable living course teaches you how to incorporate eco-friendly practices into your daily routine. Our first section highlights the areas in which eco-friendly practices are applicable and traces the impact of our consumption habits on the environment. We then explain how diets based on sustainable foods such as plants and seafood reduce greenhouse gas emissions and pollution. The course also describes the benefits of choosing locally sourced and organically grown food.

Our last section discusses the use of sustainable building materials and shows you how to increase the energy efficiency of your home. We investigate the role of renewable energy sources such as solar panels in mitigating the effects of global climate change and explain how to conserve water. Finally, we define ‘sustainable landscaping’ and provide tips for creating an environmentally friendly home and garden. This course suits anyone who wants to adopt a more sustainable lifestyle for themselves or their organisation. The measures outlined in this course can reduce your energy and food costs and improve your health and the state of the environment. Sign up to learn how to live green!
